title: How to Adjust Camera Angles in Roblox

steps.title: To make your view go closer to the ground (looking more towards the sky), look at your keyboard and find the key called "Page Down" , "PgDn" or something to that effect.
steps.content: To make your view go closer to the ground (looking more towards the sky), look at your keyboard and find the key called "Page Down" , "PgDn" or something to that effect. It is normally near the "delete", "end", and inert key. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Find the key on your keyboard labeled "Page Up" or "PgUp" to make it go up.
steps.content: Find the key on your keyboard labeled "Page Up" or "PgUp" to make it go up. It should be above the "Page Down" or the PgDn" key. Pressing this key will result in your camera view going up. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Press the "."
steps.content: Press the "." or ">" keys to make your view turn to the left. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Press the "," or the "<" key to make your view turn to the right.
steps.content: Press the "," or the "<" key to make your view turn to the right. Clicking the comma key will turn your view to the right. [4] X Research source

steps.title: If you are on a laptop and do not have a mouse, this method does not apply to you.
steps.content: If you are on a laptop and do not have a mouse, this method does not apply to you. If you do have a mouse however, just scroll forwards until you enter a first person view. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Move your mouse according to the desired position of your camera view.
steps.content: Move your mouse according to the desired position of your camera view. Scroll back out and your view should be corrected.
